lead_paragraph: Even as Donald J. Trump met with Mr. Gore, he continued to court opponents of climate control policies for key government posts.

headline.print_headline: Trump’s Meeting With Gore Offers a Glimmer of Hope to Environmental Activists
headline.main: Trump’s Meeting With Al Gore Gives Environmental Activists Hope

snippet: Even as Donald J. Trump met with Mr. Gore, he continued to court opponents of climate control policies for key government posts....
abstract: Former Vice Pres Al Gore meets with Pres-elect Donald J Trump to discuss climate change, offering hope to environmental activists that Trump administration will walk back some of his campaign promises to scrap efforts to fight global warming; Trump's transition team, however, continues to fill key posts with people ardently opposed to climate control policies.
